nodes.text: The Flip of the Credit was a casino owned by the Rodian Avaro Sookcool. It was located in Equator City on the Rodian homeworld and served as a front for money laundering conducted by Black Sun. Leia Organa met with Avaro here in order to solicit the criminal syndicate's aid in finding and rescuing the captured Han Solo. Her opinion of it was that it was a "ninth-rate, bug-chewed casino."
